job.title: Software Development Engineer
job.description: stronguJob TitlebrbrustrongSoftware Development EngineerbrbrstronguRole OverviewbrbrustrongDoes the thought of applying your passion for cloud development to secure the digital lives of millions around the world excite you McAfee is looking for software engineer that can help build its trusted consumer products web platforms and services We dig deeper into customer problems to provide an effective solution that makes customers lives easier You will be part of a development team that prides in striving to delight the McAfee customers Join the customer obsessed teambrbrstronguCompany OverviewbrbrustrongFrom device to cloud McAfee provides marketleading cybersecurity solutions for both business and consumers We help businesses orchestrate cyber environments that are truly integrated where protection detection and correction of security threats happen simultaneously For consumers McAfee secures your devices against viruses malware and other threats both at home and away We want to continue to shape the future of cybersecurity by working together to build best in class products and solutionsbrbrstronguAbout The RolebrustrongulliDevelop and debug complex software in multiple web technologiesliliDetermine best coding practices development tools and validation requirementsliliArchitect and develop largescale web and API applications on AWS focusing on performance scalability and stabilityliliWork with multiple technologists in the company and within the industry including developers and project managers to evaluate feasibility of requirements and determine priorities for developmentliliEnjoy learning new thingsliliLove taking on difficult challenges and finding creative solutionsliliHave open minds to new ideas and enjoy helping people so that they are not stuckbrliulstronguAbout YoubrustrongulliYour background includes 5 years of experience in serverside application developmentliliFluent in any of these Golang NodeJS C or JavaliliFamiliar with Serverless Application Model and RESTliliYou understand the overall AWS Cloud infrastructure EC2 Lambda RDS S3 etcliliYou are proficient in developing end debugging cloudbased applications using AWSliliYou will have a working knowledge with relational SQL and NoSQL databasesliliYou have have Software Development process optimization techniques and testing
